description.value:
Your eidolon exhales a blast of destructive energy. Your eidolon deals [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} to all creatures in a 30-foot cone, with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC.

Your eidolon then can't use their Breath Weapon again for the next [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

At 3rd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d6. [[/r (floor(@details.level.value/2))d6 #poison]]{Levelled Damage}
